text: mainne keval unase vahee kaha tha, jisaka toone aadesh diya tha ki allaah kee ibaadat karo, jo mera paalanahaar tatha tum sabhee ka paalanahaar hai. main unakee dasha jaanata tha, jab tak unamen tha aur jab toone mera samay poora kar diya[1], to too hee unhen jaanata tha aur too pratyek vastu se soochit hai
